summary: Senior Software Engineer with 12+ years of experience architecting scalable web ecosystems. Specialist in Frontend Infrastructure, Developer Tooling, and Performance Optimization. Expert in transforming legacy codebases into modern Monorepo and Micro-Frontend architectures (Module Federation, NX). Proven ability to drive technical strategy, unify engineering standards across teams, and deliver enterprise-grade solutions for global user bases.

experience.description: Lead Architect for the 'Maestro' product frontend and core contributor to the 1DS Micro-Frontend Platform. Driving the technical roadmap for developer experience (DX) and infrastructure modernization affecting 400+ engineers.
highlights: Architected a scalable Monorepo CI/CD strategy (Azure DevOps), enabling atomic deployments and previously impossible multi-package workflows.
Engineered the '1FE' open-source initiative, decoupling the core platform to accelerate internal adoption and community contribution.
Designed a custom runtime isolation environment (Storybook-style) for Micro-Frontends, eliminating brittle end-to-end mocks and boosting component discoverability.
Implemented a Cross-MFE Component Variant system, standardizing UI elements across 16 high-traffic applications and eliminating code duplication.
Spearheaded the unification of frontend architecture standards, reducing technical debt and aligning deployment strategies across the organization.

experience.description: Technical Lead for the Teams Admin Center (TAC) and M365 ecosystems. Pioneered the adoption of Micro-Frontend architectures to decouple monolithic legacy systems.
highlights: Pioneered Module Federation adoption within Teams, reducing developer onboarding time from 8 weeks to 1 week by enabling isolated local development.
Architected the frontend integration for 'Visits' analytics, orchestrating data flow between React MFEs and C#/CosmosDB backend services.
Modernized the build infrastructure for multiple product lines, migrating legacy toolchains to Webpack 5 and Yarn PnP to improve build performance.
Authored and maintained core shared libraries used across M365, enforcing strict type safety and standardization.
Designed resilience patterns and risk mitigation strategies for high-scale Frontline Worker scenarios.
Architected the 'Setup Wizard' framework for Teams Admin Center, establishing the pattern for future onboarding workflows.
Engineered the frontend for the EPIC-Teams Connector, delivering a critical healthcare integration from concept to production.
Established the team's core component library, including an OData-to-TypeScript generator and strict-typed MS Graph SDK wrappers.
Led the migration of the 'CareGiver' platform from Angular 1.x to Angular 2+, modernizing the codebase for long-term maintainability.
Developed a custom RequireJS dependency generator to automate configuration management in a pre-Webpack environment.
Evaluated and prototyped mobile architecture strategies, comparing React Native vs. Angular Hybrid solutions.
Executed the migration of legacy backend systems from PHP 5 to PHP 7, improving performance and security.
Coordinated laboratory operations for Digital Signal Processing and Analog Signals courses.
Founded a software services startup, successfully delivering a warehouse distribution application for Nestle using Cordova.
Established the initial frontend architecture and infrastructure for the company's flagship payment platform.
